Visual Poem (PDF,PNG) Generation (pdf.py)¶


These functions allow for the creation of all currently supported types of visual poems.

class generativepoetry.pdf.VisualPoemString(text, x: int, y: int, font: str, font_size: int, rgb: Optional[Tuple] = None)¶

The text drawn by reportlab at an XY coordinate–can be a line, a word, or just a character.
